title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Apr 16 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Apr 16 2022
description:
Brooklyn subway shooter has been arrested. Joining Clay and Buck for the first time, former Vice President Mike Pence, who founded Advancing American Freedom, a 501(c)(4) organization advocating for conservative values and policy proposals. VP Pence covers topics such as: open border Democrats, the Biden administration's covid response, and the war in Ukraine. New York Post columnist Karol Markowicz reacts to subway shooter arrest, and discusses conservative flight from blue states, and her belief that covid is behind crime and other issues. Coming soon: The Clay and Buck Awards?

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
